name: Note and Explain

screenshots.caption: Example of the use of Note and Explain (math explainations)

short_description:
You don't want to use a normal board or just yourself speaking to present something?
You want to digitalize your lessons or your presentations to an audience with handwritten explainations?
Use Note and Explain. Present your themes nicely and clear by using this program. It can be used for explaining...
- Mathematical formulas or facts
- Advantages and disadvantages
- Languages (grammar and vocabulary)
- Historical events
- Biological facts
- Mechanical operations
- Physical or chemical themes and processes
- ... and much more!!

Or you can use it just for taking taking notes and saving them.

Features
- Different pencil colors, rainbow color, random color, customizable colors
- Choosing any desired pencil thickness
- Highlighter with any color
- Rubber
- Completely customizable grid
- Digital laser pointer
- Fullscreen mode
- Infinitely many "sheets"
- Saving and other basic operations
- and more!

Uses
- Lessons
- Video explainations
- Presentations
- ..
summary: Explain something to an audience by writing it on a digital notepaper!
